attributes.comment:
AS A COUPLE WHO IS IN THE PROCESS OF ADOPTING A FEMALE CHILD
FROM CHINA, MY WIFE AND I WOULD LIKE TO ADD OUR VOICES TO THE
THOUSANDS WHO ARE OBJECTING TO THE PROPOSED INCREASES IN
SEVERAL FEES RELATED TO FOREIGN ADOPTION. A 66% INCREASE?
DON'T YOU THINK THAT IS A LITTLE SEVERE? WHAT IS THE PURPOSE OF
THESE INCREASES? TO LIMIT THE AMOUNT OF FOREIGN ADOPTIONS? TO
CATCH UP ON YOUR BACKLONG? OR JUST TO FIND ANOTHER WAY OF
RAISING REVENUE? WE ARE WILLING TO SPEND OVER $20,000 AS AN
INITIAL INVESTMENT IN FEES AND TRAVEL ALONE (NOT TO MENTION THE
PROBABLE $100,000+ LIFELONG INVESTMENT FOR THE REARING OF THE
CHILD) IN ORDER TO RESCUE A CHILD FROM TYRANY AND POVERTY AND
BRING HER TO AMERICA AS OUR CHILD. DON'T YOU THINK THAT IS
ENOUGH? WHATEVER HAPPENED TO THAT LINE ON THE STATUE OF
LIBERTY, "GIVE ME YOUR TIRED, YOUR POOR..YOUR HUDDLED MASSES
YEARNING TO BE FREE?" WHY ARE YOU MAKING IT EVEN MORE
DIFFICULT THAN IT ALREADY IS IS TO HELP EVEN ONE LITTLE GIRL OUT OF
THOSE "HUDDLED MASSES?"
WE STRONGLY OBJECT TO THESE PROPOSED DRACONIAN INCREASES!
SINCERELY,
RANDY AND JAN GENTRY
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Douglas Gentry
